event.title: Mentorship kick-on
event.description:
This is for everybody involved in our mentoring programme or interested in it.

A chance to discuss how it went so far, and what changes we might make to it if we keep running it or will run it again in the future.

This meetup will be followed by a Christmas social (https://www.meetup.com/CodeHub-Bristol/events/gvdwfqyxqbpb/), if you can stay for that, all the better!
